Package utils.mnist_data_io

Class MnistMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.mnist_data_io.MnistMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<MnistMatrix>
    public class MnistMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<MnistMatrix>

    MNIST matrix class.

    Class contains all info about MNIST image.

    04.07.2022
    Version:
    1.0

    • Field Detail

      • data

        private final int[][] data
        Two-dimensional array "matrix".

        Contains the pixels of a grayscale image.

      • nRows

        private final int nRows
        Number of data rows.

      • nCols

        private final int nCols
        Number of data columns.

      • label

        private int label
        The label stored by the data.

      • distance

        private double distance
        Color difference between grayscale pixels

        This property is used to sort an array of MnistMatrix.
